view.title: Configure default pricing rules
view.subtitle: Pricing baseline configured on biz metadata.

blocks.title: Owner Configure Pricing completed
blocks.message: Pricing baseline configured on biz metadata.

resultPayload.note: Pricing baseline configured on biz metadata.

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Accidentally deletes availability rule, panics". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.

requestBody.title: Owner creates business tenant API Trace

data.instruction: Customer two attempts booking overlapping demand for the same offer/resource window.
data.expectedResult: System either books correctly under capacity rules or rejects with deterministic conflict response.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Unified Operational Daily Facts Dashboard. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

resultPayload.note: Hours/lead-time baseline configured on biz metadata.

data.instruction: Create baseline availability and lead-time rules representing the UC default business hours and booking window behavior.
data.expectedResult: Availability defaults and rules are stored and can be referenced by calendars.

resultPayload.note: Hours/lead-time baseline configured on biz metadata.

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Accidentally posts data to wrong biz". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.

data.instruction: Configure pricing defaults for the offer lifecycle including call fees/manual surge if UC needs imply it.
data.expectedResult: Pricing model persists and future bookings can calculate totals deterministically.
